plot: A controversial psychiatrist conducts a retreat for patients suffering from severe cases of dissociative personality disorders. The intense, week- long treatment reveals a devious agenda that is more dangerous than their violent psychosis.
title: Rehab
plot_es: A controversial psychiatrist conducts a retreat for patients suffering from severe cases of dissociative personality disorders. The intense, week- long treatment reveals a devious agenda that is more dangerous than their violent psychosis.
plot_en: A controversial psychiatrist conducts a retreat for patients suffering from severe cases of dissociative personality disorders. The intense, week- long treatment reveals a devious agenda that is more dangerous than their violent psychosis.
